snippet.title: Chef Chen - Fantasy Cook - Early Bird on 18 Jan, 2021. Enjoy the delicious monster cuisine together.
snippet.description:
🧡Wishlist us on the steam https://lihi1.cc/z23lM
🧡Facebook@hellobuho https://lihi1.cc/b8od3
🧡Twitter @buhogame
🧡Instagram @buho_game

《Chef Chen》 is a multiplayer cooperative game, where you can cook monsters in another worlds with many stunts and enjoy foods with good friend together. The game supports up to 4 players, let’s work together to make delicious dishes! 

Would you like to sit down with your friends and have a nice meal? Play the role of Chef Chen and put your talents to good use as you and your friends defeat the monsters. Let's cook a meal together, and then sit down to enjoy the delicious food together.

Features
👍Turn monsters into delicious dishes.
👍Support up to 4 players to cook together.
👍Use skills to get through the problem.
